alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 27 at 8:32AM CST until March 02 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Leflore and Carroll Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yalobusha At Whaley. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 AM CST Sunday the stage was 20.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage this afternoon to 21.4 feet this evening. It will then fall to 21.3 feet and begin rising again tomorrow morning. It will rise to 21.5 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Yalobusha Whaley 21.0 20.4 Sun 7 am CST 21.3 21.4 19.5 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 830 PM CST.
